title: Chemicals in the Workplace
creator_credit: Kim Dalton and Open Channel Productions
brief_description: An informative program which lists harmful chemicals that are commonly used in industry. The dangerous effects that these chemicals may have on the human body, if not properly protected, are discussed and workers who have suffered from the adverse effects, of the chemicals, talk about their injuries.
